name: com.unity.settings-manager
description: A framework for making any serializable field a setting, complete with a pre-built settings interface.

samples.description: Example code showing use of the Settings Manager attributes.

_upm.changelog:
### Changes

- Enable Auto Reference on main assembly.

### Bug Fixes

- [case: PBLD-56] Added tooltip to "Options" gear icon to specify that context menu items are relevant only to the selected category.
